= Federation management <sup>[[Help:FedX | <img width="19" src="../images/navigation/help_start.png" />]]</sup> =

This interface allows to administrate a FedX federation and requires federation mode to be active. See [[Help:FedX]] for detailed information on how to use FedX within the Information Workbench. Please note that this feature is available in the Information Workbench Enterprise Edition only.
